评论详情: The dress is as shown, and fits on size. It is a bit gauzy but not so thin as to be see-through. The lace trim is a brighter green than the ribbon and dress itself. The dress is less forest green as it is deep army green. However, I recieved a dress that had been used, there were deodorant stains in the armpits that I found when ironing the dress after unpacking. I thought I was buying a new dress so this was off-putting. Not so much as to return, I washed and sanitized (no dye leakage from the wash either, color stayed true.)  But, I will not be buying from this seller again due to this.
I put together a Jennie-inspired costume from Forrest Gump for Halloween. How perfect! The fabric is light and durable! You could make so many costumes with this item.

I am a small person, 5'3 and about 120 lbs. I got the size small and I slip right through the neckline. So if you are a small framed person this will just fall right off of you. It's also kind of sheer which was expected but you'd have to wear something under it for sure. I wanted it for a costume but it didn't work out. The fabric is definitely cheap but not terrible.

It’s short and terrible quality. I’m 5’5 and it was way too short for me. Definitely not the length that’s pictured here. Quality is impressively bad and you’ll be better off just wrapping yourself in a sheet. I sent this nonsense back to where it came from
This dress looks really pretty on,  the trim on the sleeves and bottom is cheap looking and feeling.
I love this dress! It was perfect for my Witch Paddle! I wish I could wear it everyday!

评论概述: Looks how it does in the pic.
评论详情: Very comfortable and breathable. Careful because it's translucent. Also be careful with the bell sleeves, this material seems very flammable! Happy with the purchase.

The material is so so soft, the trim on the sleeves and bottom hem is subtle but pretty and I cannot wait to wear this! Seems to run a little long so if you are average height or shorter, you may need to hem it a little but well worth it. Great product and great price. Highly recommend!
Love, love, love this dress! It was GREAT for my Fiona costume! I would definitely order this dress or another one like this if I needed to.

First off let me start off with my measurements. I'm 5'3" 155-160 lbs, depending on time of month,and a 36 C chest.2 years ago I got 2 wine red and 1 black in size large and they fit PERFECTLY!  I originally bought them for Halloween but I wear them All the Time!! Great if paired with a corset or a high belt,Super Comphy! Best if washed in Cold Water n Hung Dry, while drying give a little stretch to keep length n prevent Too much shrinking,Do Not Heat Dry,Air Dry as heat Will Shrink Fabric.. Dress arrived quicker then expected...Will Definitely be Buying More!! Especially Black in size XL for a new costume n need it to be larger than normal. MUST BUY!! DO NOT HESITATE!!! LOVE THIS !!! ❤️

Doesn’t match the description. The neckline isn’t elastic, just a cheap, drawstring ribbon that only draws up on one side. I’ll have to redo it. It says the fabric is a cotton/poly blend, but I doubt there’s much cotton in it. Cheap, cheap, cheap.

Pleasantly surprised by this dress! Ordered the XL. IM 5'10" and plus size (typically wear 2XL or 3XL) and it fits nicely with room to spare. Will work great under a corset for my ren faire costume, plus its lightweight (and not see-through) which will be great in the heat.
So beautiful and flowy

评论概述: Nice looking but way TOO BIG
评论详情: I liked it but it was HUGE!! I had to return it
I'm 5'2" and this fit perfectly after one wash. Very flattering and comfortable!
Great price nicely made. Soft fabric. Perfect for under a renissance dress.
This green gown is great quality! Fabric, color and style looks perfect for a reasonable price.

It was not very sheer but still light weight and very comfortable. It was shorter than I thought it would be but that is my only complaint. I am 5' 8" and it hit about 6" from my ankles for length reference. All in all I would definitely recommend this product for any Renaissance, Larping, or Cosplay needs!

This was a perfect summer chemise, thin and airy for underlayering in the heat. It was in the 90s and muggy, and this helped keep me super cool under a corset and linen shawl-turned-overskirt. Definitely sheer, but not intended to be worn alone, so it makes sense. Good costume quality, will work for lots of characters and time periods. Might even use as a nightgown.

评论概述: The lace on the trim is not that nice.
评论详情: The lace trim on the dress is lighter and makes the dress look cheap. It is comfortable though. It was a bit larger than I was expecting.
I've bought all colors offered and like the robes very much. But would you special order the robes in the colors royal blue, violet, fuschia and a mustard yellow or golden hue?

I liked the dress out of the package and used it for a Ren Faire outfit. My only problem with it is it is very thin and see through. You need a liner underneath. I didn’t take a star off for this because it’s my own fault, but make sure you don’t dry it in a machine as it will shrink. I forgot to separate it from my other laundry. This listing says it’s cotton, but there was no label in the dress itself.

I wasn't too happy with this purchase, I am keeping it, but it does not serve the purpose I ordered it for. The fabric is kind of itchy and I felt like I put on a balloon when I tried it on lol.  I bought it for a Steampunk costume, but it will not work for that, it looks and fits like a large nightgown.  I ordered something different and hope it comes in time. I will pack this one away for Halloween or something or else order a corset to wear over it for other events.

I cannot believe how soft and lovely this is for the price. It's the perfect piece for a chemise as part of a  renaissance faire costume, or just as a nice nightgown on those evenings when a soul wants to feel a bit vintage. The material itself feels and drapes similar to rayon, although it might be a hair lighter.

The quality of this is fine and the fit around is true to size. However I am 5'6 and this thing is about 5 inches too short so I'm going to have to do some modifications to it. Anybody over about a 5'2 don't even bother unless you're looking for something really short
I liked the quality sewing and lace trim. The dress is comfortable, flare and sits heavy. The only negative is the collar which pulls from the weight of the dress.

I can't believe how great this dress was. I was a ghost for Halloween, and I was so comfortable all night. I'm 5'2", and the dress was the perfect length. I didn't trip on it once. I wore a tank top and slip underneath, and I felt totally fine. I got many compliments on my costume. Best of all, for the first time in years, I didn't overspend on my Halloween costume! Great purchase!

I'm 5'11 and this hit just above my ankles. Very lightweight and comfortable, great for a costume that you're planning to wear more than once. Loose fitting and flowy, it's not see-through which was nice.
Very shoddy workmanship.  Cheap fabric, the garment isn’t actually hemmed, but non-matching lace hem tape was used instead.  I returned it immediately.

This was perfect until it was washed. Then it shrunk so bad. It went from foot length to knee length.  I’m only 5’1”!!! I don’t wash or dry anything I own on high heat so this was bad. This needs to be preshrunk before they sew them. I suppose it needs to be hand washed in ice cold water only or dry cleaned. For how bad it shrinks and wrinkles ( think crepe paper on roids) it is costly. This has such potential and while still on my search for a premaid breathable and authentic enough looking chemise, I come back to this over and over but the cons are not worth it. It also is not color fasted. So be aware of washing with anything else and the color will fade.

I travel around the country doing Renaissance festivals so I'm always looking for less expensive, quality pieces.  These chemises work perfectly as a lightweight underdress because some costumes require several layers.  I purchased a white one about 10 years ago and it's still going strong.  This time I bought both black and red and I can't wait to wear them.  My only complaint is that the fabric tends to wrinkle, but 15 minutes in the dryer fixes that.
Should have gotten a smaller size but still looks good on

Bought as a chemise underlayer for Ren Fair garb. I ordered my natural size & had to exchange for a size down & it's still pretty big especially in the shoulder & neck area which kind of exposes more blossom than I'd like where the front tie is a bit too low. But is is super comfy & goes perfect & gives me a few outfit choices for fair.
As it appears. Lightweight but very flowy. Long enough. Very pleased, bought a 2nd.

I like the dress , its good enough to sleep in or wear out belted , or not belted. . Black , size M , 5foot 5 120 lbs, I bought a size Medium , but should have ordered the small I think , but the way it fits it doesnt make alot of difference , belt it and its not so big , tie the neck , the length is perfect .

Ok so here is my review after the mix up which the seller fixed right away.  The material is soft, lightweight, and breathable. It does go to the floor on me which everything does on me anyway, but It's not extremely long. I can walk in it without tripping on it. As for the color it's a really nice deep red. Plus it looks great with the rest of my outfit for the Star Wars Galactic Starcruiser experience I'm booked to do. I'll try to post a picture later after I've done a little tweeking of the final outfit look.
Fabric is thin but not see-through, lace is a nice touch.  Not super long, but I'm on the short end of things (5'3"), so it is a bit longer than ankle length on me.

Seriously this thing is so comfortable! I got the black in an XL because i wanted it to be, as my brother put it, "big enough to swim in". It's not so sheer that I can't wear it by itself around the house with roommates, and i can spruce it up with a coset or belt or accessories easy for an outfit option.  It's so soft too! I live in thus and just ordered the red one. :)
Love the soft fabric and overall lightweight without being sheer feel. Fits great and is a nice addition to my dress up wardrobe
I’m 5’6” and bought the green in large. It’s way too short. Returning.

Very nice chemise.  Lightweight rayon blend fabric.  Sized up to extra large (5’5”, 165lbs) and it was a perfect fit.  Length was just right and although a little large on top (38B), the neckline is drawstring and adjusts to fit.  Made the perfect witch dress with a crinoline slip underneath and witch boots.

I was hesitant to order because i waited until the last minute, but shipping only took 3 weeks and the chemises are stunning.  I ordered the black and a green one, which is a hunter type dark green with slightly lighter lace trim.  They are light, thin 100% cotton and very soft and lovely.  Stitching is nice and they touch the floor on my 5 ft 126 lb frame.  I expect them to shrink a bit since they are all cotton, so I got large instead of medium and they are a bit sheer, of course, but I plan to wear them as an under dress at the renaissance festival.  When I wear them as a dress, I'll add a slip.  BUY it, you won't regret it at all!  I'm going to order every color!

feels nice. Not luxury textile but definitely breathable and airy. The design is very witchy in black. If you are of the pointy black hat sort you will surely like it. I ordered a couple of sizes up for the extra room. It has held up fine through a few washes.

Overall, pretty good for the price. It was sheer, but that's to be expected with white fabric. Adjustable neckline was pretty good. FYI, the bottom hem is very uneven (longer on sides) and the sleeves might be a little short.
I wore this to Scarborough Faire and love the authentic look and comfortable feel.

Love this dress. Just what I wanted for our Scottish festivals. It's very thin, but perfect for my outfit and very cool/comfortable in hot weather. In 5'7", 145lbs., wear size 6. I ordered small, fit good it chest area, flowing throughout body, and hits about my ankle. So many compliments today. Super feminine. May use this as a beach cover up too.
Very nice, lightweight material. Definitely made to be a shift or underdress because of the thin material.

This was absolutely perfect! The fabric is so silky smooth and soft. Feels great against your skin. Looked wonderful with my costume. Perfect length for me. The fit was loose but hung off my shoulders perfectly with my leather corset vest. Would work great for a rennassaince garment too!
Mine fit a bit big but it works good. I’ll try to upload a picture but yeah I’m happy with it!
And should be less sheer....

I used this dress originally for a Halloween costume in 2018. After the disaster first dress I bought this one was very lovely. The material is see through when you hold it up to the light but not see through while on. It wrinkles easily but is very soft and comfortable to wear. It makes me feel like a cross between a witch and a fantasy character. I’m thinking about purchasing another one in white! I haven’t washed it yet. I’ve worn it both with and without a belt and it works great! I’ve attached a recent picture. I bought a medium and have gained some weight since I bought the dress and it still fits!
It's simply well made, and authentic in design. I especially like the neckline design with the ribbon vs. the elastic. Lovely material with a hint of lace at the hem.

I bought a maroon and a forest green.Another reviewer said hers shrank shorter when she washed it so I bought large (I wanted the dress to be long).  They were dragging when I first tried them on, but fit perfect after a hand wash, hang dry.They are light and floaty the colors are bright.  Prefect as a chemise, with vest,  with a belt, or alone.  I am very pleased with my purchase.  I am 4 foot ten.

I actually bought this to use as a nightgown and loved it. My only complaint would be that it wrinkles. I’ve hand washed and hung dry to avoid any shrinking. I probably should have gotten a small but was concerned about length so I went with a medium. Surprisingly my boyfriend also liked this even though I don’t feel like it’s a very sexy outfit. It does feel very feminine and I am looking forward to ordering more of these

评论概述: See through but still good product
评论详情: Bear in mind how shear it is. Otherwise very comfy and fits true to size.
This was very soft. Unfortunately it was a bit shorter than I needed (I’m 5’8”). The lace is a much brighter shade of green than the rest of the dress. Very noticeable.

Material was slightly thinner than expected, but worked well for the mid fall Houston renaissance faire heat. It will shrink in the wash, so hand wash or be prepared to stretch it out to dry! This could easily be used as an undergarment, or even a sleeping gown. Lovey dress.

Very pretty. Great material for the price. Can be styled in many different ways, looks very pretty with a belt or corset. I used it as a custom for Halloween, and it's also very comfortable to wear as PJ's.

Perfect length on my 5' 2.75" frame. The ribbon that holds it together looks awkward if you have it off your shoulders (because the gap is open, but you have this ribbon going across the top), so that's mildly annoying. I was also surprised that the lace edging is sewn on with a single stitch, so it's delicate cycle/hang dry only.  Overall, worth the price
I love it! It is exactly what I was looking for! Inexpensive and good quality for the price!

Honestly, I was looking for a simple nightgown that had no elastic or tight sleeves to bug me at night and this is perfect. Not to mention how soft the fabric is! The design is very pretty and very flattering also. I adore this so much.

I loved this chemise at first. My kids and husband thought it was beautiful. It was an okay length...until I washed it... unfortunately it shrank significantly. Originally, it came past my calf and now it's just below my knees and the sleeves are now 3/4 length. I am only 5' 7", so I'm not an Amazon. Also, one of the drawstring ribbon ends came very unraveled with washing. It is a beautiful color and the material is soft. I also love the lace trim. I had to take 2 stars off, though for the previously mentioned reasons.
This looks like a cheap frumpy night gown wish I would have returned it.
soft, lightweight. Some seams need repairing/resewing
As awesome as I’d hoped it would be. I’ll be purchasing all the colors for different activities and Rituals. Comfortable, sturdy, good quality.

Really really love this! I am 5"11 and ordered the X-large, it comes a few inches above my ankles which is typical of dresses for me, so flowy and slighly see through whichi like.. i want to order 10of these! I will probably hand wash and air dry.. as i am afraid of shrinking it.
Amazing quality, fast shipping, and I love the way this dress looks on me! I synched the waist and plan on getting a corset but this dress is perfect for those days I'm feeling extra witchy.
Love this dress, well worth the money.  I used it as a costume, but plan on using it again and again.  Nice material too.
Good buy; silky soft. Takes a while to deliver to USA
LOVE! Very silky and pretty. :)

I love the way this feels. I will be ordering more in the future.
Beautiful, elegant, soft. Got it for a renaissance festival.
